revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (4), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (4)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Dual-Band N600 Router with Gigabit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = http://support.linksys.com/en-us/support/lbc/EA2700 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Linksys_EA2700 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = EA2700 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-EA2700 |icid = 3839A-EA2700 |us_id = |boardid = 48SAB301.SGE
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47186B0; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U518S2CTR-BC; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5DU5162ETR-E3C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 20:AA:4B |oui = 20:AA:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = CiscoXXXXX |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = SAB301 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWRT
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/08/2012 |estreldate = 03/09/2012 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883595341 |ean = 4260184661152 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B007IL72CI |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43236; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48SAB301.SGE" and "2011/12/09" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA14567 WiFi Certified]
The FCC test report also lists the RAM and Flash as.. *Flash - '''SK hynix''' H27U518S2CTR-BC (64MB), :alternately '''Micron''' NAND512W3A2SN6F (64MB) *RAM - '''SK hynix''' H5DU5162ETR-E3C (64MB), :alternately '''EtronTech''' EM6AB160TSD-5G (64MB)
<small>The FCC test report contradicts itself by stating the router as a 'Dual-Band N600 Router with Gigabit', stating the device has 2 completed receivers and transmitters, and then stating the router supports speeds up to 450Mbps.</small>
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31738-cisco-linksys-ea2700-gigabit-dual-band-wireless-n600-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] • [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31742-cisco-linksys-ea2700-retest Retest] *[https://superevr.com/blog/2013/dont-use-linksys-routers/ ''Don't use Linksys Routers'' on '''Superevr''']
*{{Wikidevi|Linksys_EA2700}} *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=153481 Linksys Cisco EA2700 Serial Dump/CFE on '''DD-WRT''' forums]
*[http://kb.linksys.com/Linksys/GetArticle.aspx?docid=b4b7d9b19ec240019eb7fed6d2399fbc_EA2700_Frequently_Asked_Questions.xml&pid=94 ''Linksys EA2700 FAQ'' on '''Linksys''' site] :The default SSID pattern is noted as '''CiscoXXXXX''' *[http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 20:AA:4B OUI]
